thread.title: BRIEF-Cloudera Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Loss Per Share Of $0.10

title: BRIEF-Cloudera Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Loss Per Share Of $0.10
text:
April 3, 2018 / 8:42 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Cloudera Reports Q4 Non-GAAP Loss Per Share Of $0.10 Reuters Staff 
April 3 (Reuters) - Cloudera Inc: 
* CLOUDERA REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS 
* Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.10 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.31 
* Q4 REVENUE $103.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $98.6 MILLION 
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.23 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* SEES Q1 2019 TOTAL REVENUE IN RANGE OF $101 MILLION TO $102 MILLION 
* SEES Q1 2019 NON GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE IN RANGE OF $0.19 TO $0.17 PER SHARE 
* FOR FISCAL 2019 SEES TOTAL REVENUE IN RANGE OF $435 MILLION TO $445 MILLION 
* SEES NON GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE IN RANGE OF $0.62 TO $0.59 PER SHARE FOR FISCAL 2019 
* SEES SUBSCRIPTION REVENUE IN RANGE OF $370 MILLION TO $375 MILLION FOR FISCAL 2019 
* SEES SUBSCRIPTION REVENUE IN RANGE OF $85 MILLION TO $86 MILLION FOR Q1 2019 
* FY2019 REVENUE VIEW $461.1 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* FY2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.59 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
